title: The Shawshank Redemption
actors:

 Gunton , Morgan

Short Description: A banker wrongly accused of a murder ,befriends a fellow inmate ,Red,as they navigate life and seek redemption with in the confines of Shawshank State Penitentiary

title: Schindler’ s List
Short Description:
Schindler’s List is a powerful historical drama based on the true story of Oskar Schindler , a German businessman  who saved the lives of more than a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust . The film portrays the 
Horrors of the Nazi regime and Schindler ’s courageous efforts to protect and rescue jews from the concentration camps

title: The Godfather
actors:
Marlon Brando, James
Caan, Al Pacino
Short Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son, leading  to a series of tragic events

title: Inception
actors:
Leonardo DiCaprio,Ellen
Page, Joseph Gordon-
Levitt
Short Description: A skilled thief ,Cobb, is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a seemingly impossible task: inception-planting an idea in someone’s mind

title: The Dark Knight
Short Description: Batman, aided be allies and Commissioner Gordon , battles the chaos unleashed by the Joker in Gotham City

title: Pulp Fiction
actors:
John Travolta, Uma 
Thurman , Samuel L. 
Jackson
Short Description: The lives of multiple characters , including a mobster, his hitman, a boxer and two petty criminals, intertwine in a non linear narrative filled with humour ,violence and unexpected twists.

title: 12 Angry Men
Short Description: The film tells the story of a jury of 12 men as they deliberate the conviction or acquittal of a teenager charged with murder on the basis of doubt; disagreement and conflict among them force junors to Question their morals

title: Forrest Gump
Short Description: The presidencies of historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75 , whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart

title: Fight Club
Short Description:
The two bored men form an underground club with strict rules and fight other men who are fed up with their mundane lives. Their perfect partnership frays when Marla , a fellow support group crasher , attracts Tyler’s 
attention

title: Casablanca
Short Description:
Casablanca is set during World War 2 and revolves around a bitter nightclub owner in Casablanca , Morocco , who reunites  with his former lover and his resistance leader husband .As they navigate  political intrigue and 
Personal dilemmas , they face tough decisions that will test their love and loyalty
